title: 24: A Tribute to Jeff Gordon
text:
24: A Tribute to Jeff Gordon Where 
401 E Martin Luther King Boulevard Suite 207 Charlotte, NC 
10:00 a.m. Friday, Oct. 16, 2015 Categories 
Events, Sports On November 15, 1992, Jeff Gordon took the wheel of his now famous No. 24 for the first time. However, to call him a rookie would be inaccurate. Since the age of 5, Gordon had been achieving glory behind the wheel. His decades-spanning career saw him battle NASCAR greats, from inaugural NASCAR Hall of Fame inductee Dale Earnhardt to todayâ€™s current superstars. The NASCAR Hall of Fame is proud to display a career retrospective featuring nine iconic race cars from his open-wheeled beginnings through his final NASCAR Sprint Cup Series season. Admission is $19.95 for adults, $17.95 for seniors and military, $12.95 for children 5-12 and free for children younger than 5. Related
